docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: 2. 激活 kdump
docs.text:
kdump-config load

查看 kdump 状态

kdump-config show

这样， 当 Linux Kernel crash 的时候， 会产生如下的日志，并保存到 /var/crash 目录下

可以通过如下命令触发一次挂死来查看产生的 kdump 文件

echo c > /proc/sysrq-trigger

docs.text:
• Introduction to I/Q signal

  • How to solve ACLR issue

docs.title: Books
docs.text:
• Communication Systems Engineering with GNU Radio

  • Wireless Communications from the Ground Up: An SDR Perspective

docs.title: Create mkdocs project
docs.text:
mkdocs new .

the structure of the new mkdocs project directory as follows

.
├─ docs/
│  └─ index.md
└─ mkdocs.yml

docs.title: Configure mkdocs theme
docs.text:
configure the mkdocs theme (theme: material)

site_name: My site
site_url: https://mydomain.org/mysite
theme:
  name: material

docs.title: Add mkdocs navigation
docs.text:
site_name: My Docs
nav:
  - Home: index.md
  - Tools: tools.md
theme:
  name: material

In docs directory to create index.md and tools.md markdown files

.
├── docs
│   ├── index.md
│   └── tools.md
├── mkdocs.yml

docs.title: Deploy mkdocs project
docs.text:
The follow introduces how to deploy the mkdocs project to github page

Fisrt, Upload the whole mkdocs project to github repository, such as git@github.com:test/xxxx.git And then， execute following command

mkdocs gh-deploy

Now, you can access the website: https://test.github.io/xxx
